Headline: Green and Orange Line Service Delayed at Cermak
ShortDescription: Green and Orange Line trains are standing near Cermak due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Orange Line trains are standing near Cermak due to a signal problem.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#29 State

#62 Archer

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
